og.title: The Trail Blazer

article_metadata.msapplication-tooltip: A home for readers and thinkers
article_metadata.description: The time has come to give Alaskan Sarah Palin her due for putting the lie to an old adage often misattributed to Mark Twain, but once adhered to as if the country's greatest writer scrawled the advice in blood in the community square: "Never pick a fight with people who buy ink by the barrel."…
